Indexer

Indexer.php : 47

Ingests files into the repository

$pathEncoding Detected operating system path enconding. string
$debug Turns debug messages on bool
$parent RepoResource which children are created by the Indexer RepoResource
$paths File system paths where resource children are located array
$filter Regular expression for matching child resource file names. string
$filterNot Regular expression for excluding child resource file names. string
$flatStructure Should children be directly attached to the RepoResource or maybe each subdirectory should result in a separate collection resource containing its children. bool
$uploadSizeLimit Maximum size of a child resource (in bytes) resulting in the creation of binary resources. int
$collectionClass URI of an RDF class assigned to indexed collections. string
$binaryClass URI of an RDF class assigned to indexed binary resources. type
$depth How many subsequent subdirectories should be indexed. int
$autoCommit Number of resource automatically triggering a commit (0 - no auto commit) int
$containerDir Base ingestion path to be substituted with the $containerToUriPrefix to form a binary id. string
$containerToUriPrefix Namespaces to substitute the $containerDir in the ingested binary path to form a binary id. string
$includeEmpty Should resources be created for empty directories. bool
$skipMode Should files (not)existing in the Fedora be skipped? int
$versioningMode Should new versions of binary resources already existing in the Fedora be created (if not, an existing resource is simply overwritten). int
$pidPass Should PIDs (epic handles) be migrated to the new version of a resource during versioning. int
$metaLookup An object providing metadata when given a resource file path MetaLookupInterface
$metaLookupRequire Should files without external metadata (provided by the `$metaLookup` object) be skipped. bool
$repo Repository connection Repo
$commitedRes Collection of resources commited during the ingestion. Used to handle errors. array
$indexedRes Collection of indexed resources array
getRelPath() Extracts relative path from a full path (by skipping cfg:containerDir) string
detectPathEncoding() Tries to detect path encoding used in the operating system by looking into locale settings. mixed
sanitizePath() Sanitizes file path - turns all \ into / and assures it is UTF-8 encoded. string
__construct() mixed
setRepo() Sets the repository connection object Indexer
setParent() Sets the parent resource for the indexed files. Indexer
setPaths() Overrides file system paths to look into for child resources. Indexer
setAutoCommit() Controls the automatic commit behaviour. Indexer
setSkip() Defines if (and how) resources should be skipped from indexing based on their (not)existance in Fedora. Indexer
setVersioning() Defines if new versions of binary resources should be created or if they should be simply overwritten with a new binary payload. Indexer
setCollectionClass() Sets default RDF class for imported collections. Indexer
setBinaryClass() Sets default RDF class for imported binary resources. Indexer
setFilter() Sets file name filter for child resources. Indexer
setFlatStructure() Sets if child resources be directly attached to the indexed RepoResource (`$isFlat` equals to `true`) or a separate collection repository resource be created for each subdirectory (`$isFlat` equals to `false`). Indexer
setUploadSizeLimit() Sets size treshold for uploading child resources as binary resources. Indexer
setDepth() Sets maximum indexing depth. Indexer
setIncludeEmptyDirs() Sets if Fedora resources should be created for empty directories. Indexer
setContainerDir() Sets up the ingestion container path. This path is replaced with the $containerToUriPrefix to form a binary id. Indexer
setContainerToUriPrefix() Sets up the namespace replaceing the $containerDir to form a binary id. Indexer
setMetaLookup() Sets a class providing metadata for indexed files. Indexer
index() Performs the indexing. array
__index() Performs the indexing. array
indexEntry() Processes single directory entry array
isSkippedExisting() Checks if a given file should be skipped because it already exists in the repository while the Indexer skip mode is set to SKIP_EXIST or SKIP_BINARY_EXIST. bool
isSkipped() Checks if a given file system node should be skipped during import. bool
handleAutoCommit() Performs autocommit if needed bool
performUpdate() Performs file upload taking care of versioning. RepoResource
readRepoConfig() void

$paths

Indexer.php : 147

File system paths where resource children are located

private array $paths = ['']
It is a concatenation of the container root path coming from the class settings and the location path properties of the RepoResource set using the `setParent()` method. They can be also set manually using the `setPaths()` method

$uploadSizeLimit

Indexer.php : 180

Maximum size of a child resource (in bytes) resulting in the creation of binary resources.

private int $uploadSizeLimit = -1
For child resources bigger then this limit an "RDF only" Fedora resources will be created. Special value of -1 means "import all no matter their size"

setParent()

Indexer.php : 321

Sets the parent resource for the indexed files.

public setParent( $resource : RepoResource [, $strictLocations : bool = false ] ) : Indexer

Automatically sets ingestion paths based on the resource's cfg.schema.ingest.location RDF property values (only existing directories are set).

Parameters
$resource : RepoResource
$strictLocations : bool = false

should locations (parent resource path within a containerDir) be checked? (checked means at least one location must be present and all locations must exist on a local storage)

Return values
Indexer

Parameters
$paths : array
Return values
Indexer

setAutoCommit()

Indexer.php : 375

Controls the automatic commit behaviour.

public setAutoCommit( $count : int ) : Indexer

Even when you use autocommit, you should commit your transaction after Indexer::index() (the only exception is when you set auto commit to 1 forcing commiting each and every resource separately but you probably don't want to do that for performance reasons).

Parameters
$count : int

number of resource automatically triggering a commit (0 - no auto commit)

Return values
Indexer

setSkip()

Indexer.php : 389

Defines if (and how) resources should be skipped from indexing based on their (not)existance in Fedora.

public setSkip( $skipMode : int ) : Indexer
Parameters
$skipMode : int

mode either Indexer::SKIP_NONE (default), Indexer::SKIP_NOT_EXIST, Indexer::SKIP_EXIST or Indexer::SKIP_BINARY_EXIST

Return values
Indexer

setVersioning()

Indexer.php : 410

Defines if new versions of binary resources should be created or if they should be simply overwritten with a new binary payload.

public setVersioning( $versioningMode : int [, $migratePid : int = self::PID_KEEP ] ) : Indexer
Parameters
$versioningMode : int

mode either Indexer::VERSIONING_NONE, Indexer::VERSIONING_ALWAYS, Indexer::VERSIONING_CHECKSUM or Indexer::VERSIONING_DATE

$migratePid : int = self::PID_KEEP

should PIDs (epic handles) be migrated to the new version - either Indexer::MIGRATE_NO or Indexer::MIGRATE_YES

Tags
throws
Return values
Indexer

$class : string

Indexer

setFilter()

Indexer.php : 462

Sets file name filter for child resources.

public setFilter( $filter : string [, $type : int = self::MATCH ] ) : Indexer

You can choose if file names must match or must not match (skip) the filter using the $type parameter. You can set both match and skip filters by calling setFilter() two times (once with $type = Indexer::MATCH and second time with $type = Indexer::SKIP).

Filter is applied only to file names but NOT to directory names.

Parameters
$filter : string

regular expression conformant with preg_replace()

$type : int = self::MATCH

decides if $filter is a match or skip filter (can be one of Indexer::MATCH and Indexer::SKIP)

Return values
Indexer

setFlatStructure()

Indexer.php : 484

Sets if child resources be directly attached to the indexed RepoResource (`$isFlat` equals to `true`) or a separate collection repository resource be created for each subdirectory (`$isFlat` equals to `false`).

public setFlatStructure( $isFlat : bool ) : Indexer
Parameters
$isFlat : bool
Return values
Indexer

setUploadSizeLimit()

Indexer.php : 500

Sets size treshold for uploading child resources as binary resources.

public setUploadSizeLimit( $limit : bool ) : Indexer

For files bigger then this treshold a "pure RDF" Fedora resources will be created containing full metadata but no binary content.

Parameters
$limit : bool

maximum size in bytes; 0 will cause no files upload, special value of -1 (default) will cause all files to be uploaded no matter their size

Return values
Indexer

setDepth()

Indexer.php : 511

Sets maximum indexing depth.

public setDepth( $depth : int ) : Indexer
Parameters
$depth : int

maximum indexing depth (0 - only initial Resource dir, 1 - also its direct subdirectories, etc.)

Return values
Indexer

public setIncludeEmptyDirs( $include : bool ) : Indexer
